ModMetaData.name: RimTraits - General Traits
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Supported Versions:[/h1] [b]Rimworld 1.1[/b] [b]Rimworld 1.2[/b]
[h1]Get [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] to change your Trait Colours to match this mod![/h1]
This mod adds 44 traits defining a pawn's attributes, some are mutually exclusive to each other with increasing rarity for the higher tier traits.
This mod aims to add more minor traits that give each pawn a bit more uniqueness.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]44 Traits [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1234567890]RimFantasy - Temperature Pylons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talents[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508292711][KV] More Trait Slots - 1.2[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508850027]RimHUD[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1855885448]Guard For Me[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]No Known Issues [*]Supports [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2451324814][SYR] Trait Value[/url] [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Balance feedbacks are appreciated, suggestions will be considered as long as no C# is involved.
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
